answers.answer: I'm supposed to be due today. But no action. My doctor said if the baby doesn't come by the weekend I may have to be induced. Sigh...I read that inductions make contractions hurt more.
I've heard that too which makes me nervous. But I've also heard labor was much shorter so I guess that's the trade we have to make lol. More pain but less time
I'm being induced in 4 days at 39 weeks and in terrified! !!
I'm terrified too!!!  This is my first baby and I've heard so many horror stories about the pain of induction

I'm being induce in a week, I'm a mom of 3 and all my kids needed to be induce because my body can't kick start labour on its own! I never had a problem! Be brave and think about your new bundle of joy in your arms!!
Im getting induced June 20, although my due date is June 27.. Im so excited, and scared. I will be 39weeks wen i get induced.

question: My original due date is the 29th but at my appointment with my perinatologist yesterday she said that I needed to have my baby at 39 weeks due to my gestational diabetes. Any other June mommies getting induced???
title: getting induced
